verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, saying <WH559>,
This month <WH2320> shall be unto you the beginning <WH7218> of months <WH2320>: it shall be the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> of the year to you <WH8141>.

Speak <WH1696> ye unto all the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, In the tenth <WH6218> day of this month <WH2320> they shall take <WH3947> to them every man <WH376> a lamb <WH7716>, according to their fathers <WH1>' houses <WH1004>, a lamb <WH7716> for a household <WH1004>:

and if the household <WH1004> be <WH1961> too little <WH4591> for a lamb <WH7716>, then shall he and his neighbor <WH7934> next <WH7138> unto his house <WH1004> take <WH3947> one according to the number <WH4373> of the souls <WH5315>; according <WH6310> to every man <WH376>'s eating <WH400> ye shall make your count <WH3699> for the lamb <WH7716>.
Your lamb <WH7716> shall be without blemish <WH8549>, a male <WH2145> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old <WH3947>: ye shall take it from the sheep <WH3532>, or from the goats <WH5795>:

and ye shall keep <WH4931> it until the fourteenth <WH702> day <WH3117> of the same month <WH2320>; and the whole <WH3605> assembly <WH6951> of the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478> shall kill <WH7819> it at <WH996> even <WH6153>.
And they shall take <WH3947> of the blood <WH1818>, and put <WH5414> it on the two <WH8147> side-posts <WH4201> and on the lintel <WH4947>, upon the houses <WH1004> wherein they shall eat it <WH398>.
And they shall eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> in that night <WH3915>, roast <WH6748> with fire <WH784>, and unleavened bread <WH4682>; with bitter <WH4844> herbs they shall eat it <WH398>.

Eat <WH398> not of it raw <WH4995>, nor boiled <WH1310> at all with water <WH4325>, but roast <WH6748> with fire <WH784>; its head <WH7218> with its legs <WH3767> and with the inwards thereof <WH7130>.
And ye shall let nothing of it remain <WH3498> until the morning <WH1242>; but that which remaineth <WH3498> of it until the morning <WH1242> ye shall burn <WH8313> with fire <WH784>.

And thus <WH3602> shall ye eat <WH398> it <WH4975>: with your loins girded <WH2296>, your shoes <WH5275> on your feet <WH7272>, and your staff <WH4731> in your hand <WH3027>; and ye shall eat <WH398> it in haste <WH2649>: it is Jehovah <WH3068>'s passover <WH6453>.

For I will go <WH5674> through the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> in that night <WH3915>, and will smite <WH5221> all the first-born <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, both man <WH120> and beast <WH929>; and against all the gods <WH430> of Egypt <WH4714> I will execute <WH6213> judgments <WH8201>: I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

And the blood <WH1818> shall be to you for a token <WH226> upon the houses <WH1004> where ye are <WH7200>: and when I see the blood <WH1818>, I will pass <WH6452> over you <WH5063>, and there shall no plague be upon you to destroy <WH4889> you <WH5221>, when I smite the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And this day <WH3117> shall be unto you for a memorial <WH2146>, and ye shall keep <WH2287> it a feast <WH2282> to Jehovah <WH3068>: throughout your generations <WH1755> ye shall keep it a feast <WH2287> by an ordinance <WH2708> for ever <WH5769>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall ye eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>; even <WH389> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> ye shall put away <WH7673> leaven <WH7603> out of your houses <WH1004>: for whosoever eateth <WH398> leavened bread <WH2557> from the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> until the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off from Israel <WH3478>.

And in the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> there shall be to you a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>, and in the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>; no manner of work <WH4399> shall be done <WH6213> in them <WH389>, save that which every man <WH5315> must eat <WH398>, that only may be done by you <WH6213>.

And ye shall observe <WH8104> the feast of unleavened bread <WH4682>; for in this selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117> have I brought <WH3318> your hosts <WH6635> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: therefore shall ye observe <WH8104> this day <WH3117> throughout your generations <WH1755> by an ordinance <WH2708> for ever <WH5769>.

In the first <WH7223> month <WH6240>, on the fourteenth day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> at even <WH6153>, ye shall eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>, until the one <WH259> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> at even <WH6153>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall there be no leaven <WH7603> found <WH4672> in your houses <WH1004>: for whosoever eateth <WH398> that which is leavened <WH2556>, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478>, whether he be a sojourner <WH1616>, or one that is born <WH249> in the land <WH776>.
Ye shall eat <WH398> nothing leavened <WH2556>; in all your habitations <WH4186> shall ye eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>.

Then Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> for all the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>, and said <WH559> unto them <WH4900>, Draw out, and take <WH3947> you lambs <WH6629> according to your families <WH4940>, and kill <WH7819> the passover <WH6453>.

And ye shall take <WH3947> a bunch <WH92> of hyssop <WH231>, and dip <WH2881> it in the blood <WH1818> that is in the basin <WH5592>, and strike <WH5060> the lintel <WH4947> and the two <WH8147> side-posts <WH4201> with the blood <WH1818> that is in the basin <WH5592>; and none <WH376> of you shall go out <WH3318> of the door <WH6607> of his house <WH1004> until the morning <WH1242>.

For Jehovah <WH3068> will pass through <WH5674> to smite <WH5062> the Egyptians <WH4714>; and when he seeth <WH7200> the blood <WH1818> upon the lintel <WH4947>, and on the two <WH8147> side-posts <WH4201>, Jehovah <WH3068> will pass over <WH6452> the door <WH6607>, and will not suffer <WH5414> the destroyer <WH7843> to come <WH935> in unto your houses <WH1004> to smite you <WH5062>.
And ye shall observe <WH8104> this thing <WH1697> for an ordinance <WH2706> to thee and to thy sons <WH1121> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.

And it shall come to pass <WH935>, when ye are come to the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> will give <WH5414> you <WH1696>, according as he hath promised, that ye shall keep <WH8104> this service <WH5656>.
And it shall come to pass <WH1121>, when your children shall say <WH559> unto you <WH5656>, What mean ye by this service?

that ye shall say <WH559>, It is the sacrifice <WH2077> of Jehovah <WH3068>'s passover <WH6453>, who passed <WH6452> over the houses <WH1004> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in Egypt <WH4714>, when he smote <WH5062> the Egyptians <WH4714>, and delivered <WH5337> our houses <WH1004>. And the people <WH5971> bowed the head <WH6915> and worshipped <WH7812>.
And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH3212> and did <WH6213> so <WH3068>; as Jehovah had commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>, so did they <WH6213>.

And it came to pass at midnight <WH2677>, that Jehovah <WH3068> smote <WH5221> all the first-born <WH1060> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the first-born <WH1060> of Pharaoh <WH6547> that sat <WH3427> on his throne <WH3678> unto the first-born <WH1060> of the captive <WH7628> that was in the dungeon <WH1004>; and all the first-born <WH1060> of cattle <WH929>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> rose up <WH6965> in the night <WH3915>, he <WH5650>, and all his servants, and all the Egyptians <WH4714>; and there was a great <WH1419> cry <WH6818> in Egypt <WH4714>; for there was not a house <WH1004> where there was not one dead <WH4191>.

And he called <WH7121> for Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> by night <WH3915>, and said <WH559>, Rise up <WH6965>, get you forth <WH3318> from among <WH8432> my people <WH5971>, both ye and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; and go <WH3212>, serve <WH5647> Jehovah <WH3068>, as ye have said <WH1696>.
Take <WH3947> both your flocks <WH6629> and your herds <WH1241>, as ye have said <WH1696>, and be gone <WH3212>; and bless me also <WH1288>.
And the Egyptians <WH4714> were urgent <WH2388> upon the people <WH5971>, to send <WH7971> them out of the land <WH776> in haste <WH4116>; for they said <WH559>, We are all dead men <WH4191>.

And the people <WH5971> took <WH5375> their dough <WH1217> before it was leavened <WH2556>, their kneading-troughs <WH4863> being bound up <WH6887> in their clothes <WH8071> upon their shoulders <WH7926>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> according to the word <WH1697> of Moses <WH4872>; and they asked <WH7592> of the Egyptians <WH4714> jewels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, and jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, and raiment <WH8071>:

and Jehovah <WH3068> gave <WH5414> the people <WH5971> favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, so that they let them have <WH7592> what they asked <WH5337>. And they despoiled the Egyptians <WH4714>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> journeyed <WH5265> from Rameses <WH7486> to Succoth <WH5523>, about six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> thousand <WH505> on foot <WH7273> that were men <WH1397>, besides <WH905> children <WH2945>.
And a mixed <WH6154> multitude <WH7227> went up <WH5927> also with them <WH6629>; and flocks, and herds <WH1241>, even very <WH3966> much <WH3515> cattle <WH4735>.

And they baked <WH644> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH5692> of the dough <WH1217> which they brought forth <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714>; for it was not leavened <WH2556>, because they were thrust out <WH1644> of Egypt <WH4714>, and could <WH3201> not tarry <WH4102>, neither had they prepared <WH6213> for themselves any victuals <WH6720>.
Now the time <WH4186> that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> in Egypt <WH4714> was four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141>.

And it came to pass at the end <WH7093> of four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141>, even the selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117> it came to pass <WH6635>, that all the hosts of Jehovah <WH3068> went out <WH3318> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

It is a night <WH3915> to be much observed <WH8107> unto Jehovah <WH3068> for bringing <WH3318> them out from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: this is that night <WH3915> of Jehovah <WH3068>, to be much observed <WH8107> of all the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> throughout their generations <WH1755>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>, This is the ordinance <WH2708> of the passover <WH6453>: there shall no foreigner <WH1121> eat thereof <WH398>;
but every man <WH376>'s servant <WH5650> that is bought <WH4736> for money <WH3701>, when thou hast circumcised <WH4135> him <WH398>, then shall he eat thereof.
A sojourner <WH8453> and a hired servant <WH7916> shall not eat thereof <WH398>.

In one <WH259> house <WH1004> shall it be eaten <WH398>; thou shalt not carry forth <WH3318> aught of the flesh <WH1320> abroad <WH2351> out of the house <WH1004>; neither shall ye break <WH7665> a bone thereof <WH6106>.
All the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478> shall keep it <WH6213>.

And when a stranger <WH1616> shall sojourn <WH1481> with thee <WH6213>, and will keep the passover <WH6453> to Jehovah <WH3068>, let all his males <WH2145> be circumcised <WH4135>, and then let him come near <WH7126> and keep <WH6213> it <WH249>; and he shall be as one that is born in the land <WH776>: but no uncircumcised person <WH6189> shall eat thereof <WH398>.
One <WH259> law <WH8451> shall be to him that is home-born <WH249>, and unto the stranger <WH1616> that sojourneth <WH1481> among you <WH8432>.
Thus did <WH6213> all the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>; as Jehovah <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175>, so did they <WH6213>.

And it came to pass the selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117>, that Jehovah <WH3068> did bring <WH3318> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> by their hosts <WH6635>.
